name: Charles PARKER, Petitioner v. Hon. Judge Amanda COOPERMAN, et al., Respondents

parties: Charles PARKER, Petitioner v. Hon. Judge Amanda COOPERMAN, et al., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of August, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
97 A.3d 733
Charles PARKER, Petitioner v. Hon. Judge Amanda COOPERMAN, et al., Respondents.
No. 79 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 8, 2014.
